title: So we now know Sivir's side job,
body: Morgana might be a baker but Sivir is clearly a make-up artist. Look at that face, everything is on fleek. You might think a warrior going out to murder people wouldn't care about their appearance but not Sivir, she takes that extra hour in the morning just to do her face! Where is her salon, I want to go! {{champion:15}} Even her normal splash-art is giving you face. I want this skin now. Not the Victorious one but I want a Make-up artist Sivir one. Her q could be a make-up compact and everything. Basically I am excited about Sivirs make-up ability along with the Victorious skin I will never get to use! {{champion:32}}

replies.body: I mean come on, you can't go killing people looking like you just got out of bed

http://orig11.deviantart.net/c92c/f/2011/132/6/7/silent_hill_2_eddie_by_parrafahell-d3g7p9e.jpg
Eddie, you can't just kill someone cause of the way they looked at you!
That dog had it coming! He was walking all over me!
I'm pretty sure it was established in the old lore that Sivir was a model or at least has her own clothes line
Pantheon isn't aloud to be a baker? But Sivir is aloud to be a clothing designer? WTF RITO
u morons are aloud to post on the boards but graves cant have a cigar wtf gift me a skin
you call people morons but you can't spell allowed correctly?

Neither did the first guy.

But this guy's also a troll, fairly certain.  He's been making these posts all day.
It might be "trolling" but in my mind it's still being retarded. It's a pathetic, weak excuse for trolling.
Using the word "retarded" is quite offensive to some people, and while I do understand I may sound judgmental by saying this, it's insulting.
My bad, I would be offended if I was mentally handicapped and got compared to that guy.
It's just a shame they're actually giving it to Sivir. She's easily the most meh adc in the game in terms of appeal. She's just really not interesting.
She was influential this season, which is the reason why she got it. It's the same as all the other champions in previous seasons.

I know why she's getting it; the selection process isn't entirely arbitrary. Doesn't change the fact that it's going to a really boring champion. Whenever Sivir isn't good, no one plays her. She's so unappealing that you have to make her OP to get people to play her, just like Skarner.

Popular champions get skins: People say it's only because they're popular.

Unpopular champions get skins: People say they're too unappealing to bother.
we dont know if its Sivir, it could be Kayle or anyone the victorious faces are always different

> [{quoted}](name=DoflamingoGT,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=TMynM41b,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-10-03T07:11:44.791+0000)
>
> we dont know if its Sivir, it could be Kayle or anyone the victorious faces are always different

It is an adc this year, plus the head jewel and the weapon she is holding scream Sivir. I think it is pretty much confirmed like a 78% confirmation, plus I think she sums up the competitive meta of this year pretty well. She wasn't an overwhelming pick but was always there.
It's Draven. Why can't you people use common sense?!?
They said it would be a marksman this year, so it most likely is Siver..... unless we're getting trolled super hard here.
Yeah,and I'm pretty sure Quinn has a four pronged boomerang lying around the shack she lives in on her swamp.
